website_summaries.verdict: With its spacious, L-shaped desktop, file cabinet drawer, 6 bookshelf cubes, and storage hutch, it provides a “place for everything, and everything in its place.”
pros: Its expertly crafted materials are engineered for durability and stability
Offers a file cabinet drawer and hutch with extra cubby storage
cons: Weighs close to 400 pounds and is difficult to move after construction

customer_reviews.title: Nice Home Desk Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good in my home but if you are not one keen on putting things together, get it put together by someone because all of this takes quite a bit of time to assemble. The directions are good and all pieces were there but plan on spending time putting this whole thing together. My only gripe is the larger filing cabinet I got as part of the package does not have a sturdy bottom. If you don't use the hanging files thing, you wont be able to put much into the bottom of both drawers. I'm surprised it wasnt designed with a cross beam of some kind to support at least a little weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk, Great Price, Extremely Happy !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best desks that I have every had. Large for storage and desk top space with the added lateral file cabinet. It was very very easy to put together, just took some time. I was able to put all five pieces together in about 5 or 6 hours. I have received lots of compliments on the desk and the look. One small issues, I was missing a 1 screw and I contact Bush. They sent a package of the screw overnight when I only needed 1 and in the middle of this COVID-19 crisis. Highly impressed with the customer service. I would recommend this desk to anyone with a home office.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful desk for the price. Still just particle board, but the finish looks great and the price point was right now. Love the bookshelf and the file cabinet, they create a wonderful look and complete the desk and hutch to make a great home office. Lots of storage space and a large work surface on the desk. Very pleased with purchase, but glad I didn't buy the set at it's full retail value of over $1,200. The approximate $700 value here on Amazon was much more reasonable for the quality of furniture, but I'm very pleased at the nicer quality than Ikea or Walmart typically bring on their lower end furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Seri

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: ordered for new office, excellent price, took an evening with my son to put together but no hitches on the install. For the price its a great deal. I replaced the handle pulls on the drawer of the desk and the double file cabinet, they were plastic and my kid stripped one installing it, so went to local hardware store that weekend and just picked up a few metal pulls. Color (coffee) is great and in my opinion looks better than many desk stations I have seen for hundreds more.
customer_reviews.author: salhb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for the price and amazing quality. If you read the directions carefully before assembling, you run a better chance of putting it together without error. I ordered the whole set and it took about a week to get it all up and functioning. Note: the bars for the file cabinets are a little hard to put together, you have to literally slam them together with all your might (I had to get a friend's help!).
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Cross

customer_reviews.title: I suppose it's not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is only ok. The directions could use some work. For example, there were several similar screws, however directions don't say which to use where. You must guess. For the price, I suppose it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality... Heavy.... Difficult to build
customer_reviews.text: cheap quality... Heavy.... Difficult to build.. took two full days to assemble... very cheap quality.... very heavy once built.. cannot relocate in the room easilly after construction...
customer_reviews.author: eshopperrock35

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This desk was exactly what I was looking for my office. It has the extra room I was looking for without being huge.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: This is not a very good desk. The drawers don't align
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very good desk. The drawers don't align, it scratches easy and they are really cheap panels for the back. It just looks cheap. The separate filing cabinet seems better than the rest of the furniture. The desk alone I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LAGV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk set, shipping was fast and everything was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Leatherbury

customer_reviews.title: Great quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Although due to significant amounts of parts, it is cumbersome to out this together. At times for some things, it's hard to figure out from picture on how to put pieces together
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Patel

customer_reviews.title: for the money this cost me im not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: the very top of the desk is caved in..for the money this cost me im not happy at all..looks like this is used.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Furniture is nice once built. In my opinion too many parts and steps required to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage ! This furniture is worse than any "fiberboard" desk I have ever purchased. it basically disintegrated after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Young

customer_reviews.title: do NOT order!!!!  JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could select NO stars!!! Opened box to assemble, several pieces have the "wood" laminate coming off, couple pieces scratched, drawers do not line up well. Absolutely horrible. Pieces to 1 drawer missing, part to "hold" electronics ie cell phone is a joke it's fuzz covered card board AND they sent a cream color one instead of the one that goes to this desk.... that's just the desk stay tuned for, hutch and book case, UGH Worse money I ever spent. I am a disabled veteran, and for me to try to repack and deal with return is not an option. Please, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IT IS NOT WORTH $5.00 DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Buy parts individually
customer_reviews.text: Seller committed to price match before delivery. I accepted delivery and then will not issue partial refund. Parts can be purchased individually for 35% less.
customer_reviews.author: earl j thompson

product_meta.title: Bush Furniture Cabot L Shaped Desk with Hutch, 6 Cube Organizer and Lateral File Cabinet in Harvest Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:Harvest CherryWork in style with the Bush Furniture Cabot L Shaped Desk with Hutch, 6 Cube Organizer and Lateral File Cabinet. Enjoy a beautiful traditional look with smart features for your convenience. The L Shaped Desk design provides a large durable work surface and just the right amount of storage to keep you feeling neat and organized. Desk storage details include an enclosed cabinet with stylish fluted glass door, a box drawer for supplies and a full-extension file drawer. Technology features such as a built-in 4-port USB hub add convenience. The Hutch boasts a matching fluted glass door, two large open compartments and four work-in-process areas to help keep your Desk surface clutter free, along with a cable management system to control your cords. Anything that doesn't fit in the Desk or Hutch will find a home in the 6 Cube Organizer - a great place for books, binders and decor. Featuring two spacious drawers, the Lateral File Cabinet is crafted to hold both letter and legal-size files with ease. Each drawer is fitted with Chrome-finished handles and full-extension ball bearing slides that provide an easy reach to the back with a smooth open and close. Quality construction meets ANSI/SOHO test standards for safety and performance. Beautiful Espresso Oak, Harvest Cherry and Heather Gray finish options create a simple, elegant and timeless appearance. Backed by a 1 Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: Large durable work surface lets you spread out comfortably
Integrated 4-port USB hub keeps devices connected
Stash electronics in handy soft storage tray
Concealed storage cabinet on Desk features stylish fluted glass door
File drawers accommodate letter-, legal- and A4-sized files and glide on smooth full-extension ball bearing slides

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
